name: Empty Nest
description:
#KSUGameJam

Hello! We are so excited for you to be playing our game and (hopefully) enjoying it! In our game,
Empty Nest, you play as Emmeline. Emmeline is a young robot girl, adopted by human parents
when they learned of their inability to have a child. However, one night after Emmeline is
powered down to charge, she finds herself all alone at home. Help Emmeline find out where her
parents went by exploring the house and interacting with objects found along the way. 

Some features of the game to point out:
Point and Click Mystery
Original Artwork
F4 - Fullscreen
F3 - Debug Menu
R - Restart Game

I programmed this specifically for a 3200x1800 screen only. Sorry.
